walletService_passwordCancelled: TT_Wallet passphrase not entered. Action cancelled.
walletService_enterPassword: TT_Please enter passphrase to unlock wallet. This was set when first encrypting the wallet.
walletService_enterPasswordEncrypt: TT_Please enter passphrase to encrypt the wallet. You will need to remember this password to access the wallet in the future!
walletService_backup_prompt:
TT_Do you want to back up the new wallet?
(It is highly recommended to backup your wallet)
walletService_backup_fail: TT_There was an error attempting to backup the wallet
walletService_couldNotUnlock: TT_Could not unlock wallet, unknown error occured
footer_lockwallet_shouldUnlocked: TT_Wallet is encrypted and currently locked. Click to unlock.
footer_lockwallet_shouldLocked: TT_Wallet is encrypted and currently unlocked. Click to re-lock.
footer_lockwallet_locked: TT_Are you sure you want to re-lock the wallet?
